name: Red Stickman Fighter Adventure
description:
Red Stickman, a totally new old school adventure game, will surprise you with the greatest adventure of Stickman to the World!!
You love to play this hand fighting game. Use your epic fighting skills and win battle against kung fu boss. Start your duel fighting arcade game in multiple kung fu battle environments for eliminate the enemies and Gangster. Red spider hero and others super hero are waiting for you. Choose your favorite stickman superhero and start stick fighting.
Features of Red Stickman - Animation Parkour Fighter
- Various maps and levels being updated frequently
- Easy but addictive teamwork gameplay
- Nice characters and design
- Full of stickman destruction all-action blockbuster soaked up all the best in stickman warriors games
- Smooth control
- Fight and win to unlock various new skin
Download Red Stickman - Animation Parkour Fighter now!
publishers: THAI HOA TECHNOLOGY AND MEDIA SOLUTION JOINT STOCK COMPANY
